text: (into comlink) Echo Three to Echo Seven. Han, old buddy, do you read me?
(over comlink) Loud and clear, kid. What's up?
(into comlink) Well, I finished my circle. I don't pick up any life readings.
(over comlink) There isn't enough life on this ice cube to fill a space cruiser. The sensors are placed, I'm going back.
(into comlink) Right. I'll see you shortly. There's a meteorite that hit the ground near here. I want to check it out. It won't take long.
Hey, steady girl. What's the matter? You smell something?
Aaargh!
Chewie!
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: All right, don't lose your temper. I'll come right back and give you a hand.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Solo?
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: No sign of life out there, General. The sensors are in place. You'll know if anything comes around.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: Commander Skywalker reported in yet?
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: No. He's checking out a meteorite that hit near him.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: (indicates radar screen) With all the meteor activity in this system, it's going to be difficult to spot approaching ships.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: General, I've got to leave. I can't stay anymore.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: I'm sorry to hear that.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: Well, there's a price on my head. If I don't pay off Jabba the Hut, I'm a dead man.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: A death mark's not an easy thing to live with. You're a good fighter, Solo. I hate to lose you.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: Thank you, General.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: (with feeling) Well, Your Highness, I guess this is it.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: That's right.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: (cooly) Well, don't get all mushy on me. So long, Princess.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: Han!
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - ICE CORRIDOR

text: Yes, Your Highnessness?
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - ICE CORRIDOR

text: I thought you decided to stay.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - ICE CORRIDOR

text: Well, the bounty hunter we ran into on Ord Mantell changed my mind.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - ICE CORRIDOR

text: Han, we need you!
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - ICE CORRIDOR

text: We?
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - ICE CORRIDOR

text: Yes.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - ICE CORRIDOR

text: Oh, what about you need?
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - ICE CORRIDOR

text: (mystified) I need? I don't know what you're talking about.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - ICE CORRIDOR

text: (shakes his head, fed up) You probably don't.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - ICE CORRIDOR

text: And what precisely am I supposed to know?
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - ICE CORRIDOR

text: Come on! You want me to stay because of the way you feel about me.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - ICE CORRIDOR

text: Yes. You're a great help to us. You're a natural leader...
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - ICE CORRIDOR

text: No! That's not it. Come on. Aahhh - uh huh! Come on.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - ICE CORRIDOR

text: You're imagining things.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - ICE CORRIDOR

text: Am I? Then why are you following me? Afraid I was going to leave without giving you a goodbye kiss?
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - ICE CORRIDOR

text: I'd just as soon kiss a Wookiee.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - ICE CORRIDOR

text: I can arrange that. You could use a good kiss!
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - ICE CORRIDOR

text: Don't try to blame me. I didn't ask you to turn on the thermal heater. I merely commented that it was freezing in the princess' chamber. But it's supposed to be freezing. How are we going to dry out all her clothes? I really don't know.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - ANOTHER ICE CORRIDOR

text: Oh, switch off.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - ANOTHER ICE CORRIDOR

text: (to Chewie) Why do you take this apart now? I'm trying to get us out of here and you pull both of these.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Excuse me, sir.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: (to Chewie) Put them back together right now.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Might I have a word with you, please?
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: What do you want?
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Well, it's Princess Leia, sir. She's been trying to get you on the communicator.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: I turned it off. I don't want to talk to her.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Oh. Well, Princess Leia is wondering about Master Luke. He hasn't come back yet. She doesn't know where he is.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: I don't know where he is.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Nobody knows where he is.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: What do you mean, "nobody knows"?
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Well, uh, you see...
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Deck Officer. Deck Officer!
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Excuse me, sir. Might I inqu...
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Yes, sir?
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Do you know where Commander Skywalker is?
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: I haven't seen him. It's possible he came in through the south entrance.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: It's possible? Why don't you go find out? It's getting dark out there.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Yes, sir.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Excuse me, sir. Might I inquire what's going on?
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Why not?
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Impossible man. Come along, ARTOO, let's find Princess Leia. Between ourselves, I think Master Luke is in considerable danger.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Sir, Commander Skywalker hasn't come in through the south entrance. He might have forgotten to check in.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN ICE TUNNEL

text: Not likely. Are the speeders ready?
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN ICE TUNNEL

text: Not yet. We're having some trouble adapting them to the cold.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN ICE TUNNEL

text: Then we'll have to go out on Tauntauns.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN ICE TUNNEL

text: Sir, the temperature's dropping too rapidly.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN ICE TUNNEL

text: That's right. And my friends out in it.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN ICE TUNNEL

text: I'll cover sector twelve. Have com-control set screen alpha.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN ICE TUNNEL

text: Your Tauntaun'll freeze before you reach the first marker.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN ICE TUNNEL

text: Then I'll see you in hell!
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN ICE TUNNEL

text: You must come along now, ARTOO. There's really nothing more we can do. And my joints are freezing up.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN ICE TUNNEL

text: Don't say thing like that! Of course we'll see Master Luke again. He'll be quite all right, you'll see. (to himself) Stupid little short-circuit. He'll be quite all right.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN ICE TUNNEL

text: Sir, all the patrols are in. There's still no contact from Skywalker or Solo.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN ICE TUNNEL

text: Mistress Leia, ARTOO says he's been quite unable to pick up any signals, although he does admit that his own range is far too weak to abandon all hope.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN ICE TUNNEL

text: Your Highness, there's nothing more we can do tonight. The shield doors must be closed.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN ICE TUNNEL

text: Close the doors.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN ICE TUNNEL

text: Yes, sir.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN ICE TUNNEL

text: ARTOO says the chances of survival are seven hundred seventy-five...to one.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN ICE TUNNEL

text: Actually, ARTOO has been known to make mistakes... from time to time. Oh, dear, oh, dear. Don't worry about Master Luke. I'm sure he'll be all right. He's quite clever, you know... for a human being.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN ICE TUNNEL

text: Luke... Luke.
(weakly) Ben?
You will go to the Dagobah system.
Dagobah system?
There you will learn from Yoda, the Jedi Master who instructed me.
(groaning faintly) Ben... Ben.
Luke! Luke! Don't do this, Luke. Come on, give me a sign here.
Not much time.
(moaning) Ben... Ben...
Hang on, kid.
Dagobah system...
(reeling from the odor) Whew...
Dagobah...
This may smell bad, kid...
(moaning) Yoda...
...but it will keep you warm... til I get the shelter built. (struggling to get Luke inside the carcass) Ooh... I thought they smelled bad on the outside!
(into transmitter) Echo Base... I've got something! Not much, but it could be a life form.
(into transmitter) This is Rogue Two. this is Rogue Two. Captain Solo, so you copy? Commander Skywalker, do you copy? This is Rogue Two.
(filtered over Zev's receiver) Good morning. Nice of you guys to drop by.
(switching transmitters) Echo Base... this is Rogue Two. I found them. Repeat, I found them.
Master Luke, sir, it's so good to see you fully functional again.
ARTOO expresses his relief, also.
How are you feeling, kid? You don't look so bad to me. In fact, you look strong enough to pull the ears off a Gundark.
Thanks to you.
That's two you owe me, junior.
Well your Worship, looks like you managed to keep me around for a little while longer.
(haughtily) I had nothing to do with it. General Rieekan thinks it's dangerous for any ships to leave the system until we've activated the energy shield.
That's a good story. I think you just can't bear to let a gorgeous guy like me out of your sight.
I don't know where you get your delusions, laser brain.
Laugh it up, fuzzball. But you didn't see us alone in the south passage.
She expressed her true feelings for me.
My...! Why, you stuck up,... half- witted... scruffy-looking ...nerf-herder!
Who's scruffy-looking? (to Luke) I must have hit pretty close to the mark to get her all riled up like that, huh, kid?
Why, I guess you don't know everything about women yet?
(over loudspeaker) Headquarters personnel, report to command center.
Take it easy.
Excuse us, please.
Princess... we have a visitor.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: We've picked up something outside the base in zone twelve, moving east.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: It's metal.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: Then it couldn't be one of those creatures that attacked Luke.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: It could be a speeder, one of ours.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: No. Wait - there's something very weak coming through.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: Sir, I am fluent in six million forms of communication. This signal is not used by the Alliance. It could be an Imperial code.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: It isn't friendly, whatever it is. Come on, Chewie, let's check it out.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: Send Rogues Ten and Eleven to station three-eight.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: (over comlink) Afraid there's not much left.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: (into comlink) What was it?
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: (over comlink) Droid of some kind. I didn't hit it that hard. It must have had a self-destruct.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: (into comlink) An Imperial probe droid.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: (over comlink) It's a good bet the Empire knows we're here.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: We'd better start the evacuation.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - COMMAND CENTER

text: Admiral.
where: INT. DARTH VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - BRIDGE - MAIN CONTROL DECK

text: Yes, Captain
where: INT. DARTH VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - BRIDGE - MAIN CONTROL DECK

text: I think we've got something, sir. The report is only a fragment from a probe droid in the Hoth system, but it's the best lead we've had.
where: INT. DARTH VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - BRIDGE - MAIN CONTROL DECK

text: (irritated) We have thousands of probe droids searching the galaxy. I want proof, not leads!
where: INT. DARTH VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - BRIDGE - MAIN CONTROL DECK

text: The visuals indicate life readings.
where: INT. DARTH VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - BRIDGE - MAIN CONTROL DECK

text: It could mean anything. If we followed every lead...
where: INT. DARTH VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - BRIDGE - MAIN CONTROL DECK

text: But, sir, the Hoth system is supposed to be devoid of human forms.
where: INT. DARTH VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - BRIDGE - MAIN CONTROL DECK

text: You found something?
where: INT. DARTH VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - BRIDGE - MAIN CONTROL DECK

text: Yes, my lord.
where: INT. DARTH VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - BRIDGE - MAIN CONTROL DECK

text: (studying the image on the console screen) That's it. The Rebels are there.
where: INT. DARTH VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - BRIDGE - MAIN CONTROL DECK

text: My lord, there are so many uncharted settlements. It could be smugglers, it could be...
where: INT. DARTH VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - BRIDGE - MAIN CONTROL DECK

text: That is the system. And I'm sure Skywalker is with them. Set your course for the Hoth system. General Veers, prepare you men.
where: INT. DARTH VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - BRIDGE - MAIN CONTROL DECK

text: Groups seven and ten will stay behind to fly the speeders. As soon as each transport is loaded, evacuation control will give clearance for immediate launch.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - TRANSPORT BAY

text: Right, sir.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - TRANSPORT BAY

text: (into comlink, to Chewie) Okay, that's it. Try it... Off! Turn it off! Turn it off! Off!
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Sir, it will take quite a while to evacuate the T-forty- sevens.
Well, forget the heavy equipment. There's plenty of time to get the smaller modules on the transports.
Take care, sir.
Thanks.
Chewie, take care of yourself, okay?
where: INT. REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Hi, kid. (to droid) There's got to be a reason for it. Check it at the other end. Wait a second. (to Luke) You all right?
where: INT. REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Yeah.
where: INT. REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Be careful.
where: INT. REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: You, too.
where: INT. REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: General, there's a fleet of Star Destroyers coming out of hyperspace in sector four.
Reroute all power to the energy shield. We've got to hold them till all transports are away. Prepare for ground assault.
What is it, General?
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER - MEDITATION CUBICLE

text: My lord, the fleet has moves out of light-speed. Com-Scan has detected an energy field protecting an area around the sixth planet of the Hoth system. The field is strong enough to deflect any bombardment.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER - MEDITATION CUBICLE

text: (angrily) The Rebels are alerted to our presence. Admiral Ozzel came out of light-speed too close to the system.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER - MEDITATION CUBICLE

text: He felt surprise was wiser...
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER - MEDITATION CUBICLE

text: He is as clumsy as he is stupid. General, prepare your troops for a surface attack.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER - MEDITATION CUBICLE

text: Yes, my lord.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER - MEDITATION CUBICLE

text: Lord Vader, the fleet has moved out of light-speed, and we're preparing to... Aaagh!
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER - MEDITATION CUBICLE

text: You have failed me for the last time, Admiral. Captain Piett.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER - MEDITATION CUBICLE

text: Yes, my lord.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER - MEDITATION CUBICLE

text: Make ready to land out troops beyond the energy shield and deploy the fleet so that nothing gets off that system. You are in command now, Admiral Piett.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER - MEDITATION CUBICLE

text: Thank you, Lord Vader.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER - MEDITATION CUBICLE

text: All troop carriers will assemble at the north entrance. The heavy transport ships will leave as soon as they're loaded. Only two fighter escorts per ship. The energy shield can only be opened for a short time, so you'll have to stay very close to your transports.
where: INT. REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Two fighters against a Star Destroyer?
where: INT. REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: The ion cannon will fire several shots to make sure that any enemy ships will be out of your flight path. When you've gotten past the energy shield, proceed directly to the rendezvous point. Understood?
where: INT. REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: (in unison) Right. Okay.
where: INT. REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Good luck.
where: INT. REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Okay. Everyone to your stations. Let's go!
where: INT. REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Their primary target will be the power generators. Prepare to open the shield.
Sir, Rebel ships are coming into our sector.
Good. Our first catch of the day.
Stand by, ion control... Fire
(over loudspeaker) The first transport is away.
where: INT. REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Feeling all right, sir?
where: INT. REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Just like new, Dack. How about you?
where: INT. REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Right now I feel like I could take on the whole Empire myself.
where: INT. REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: (quietly, strapping in) I know what you mean.
where: INT. REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR DECK

text: Echo Station Three-T-Eight.
where: EXT. HOTH - ICE PLAIN - SNOW TRENCH

text: (over comlink) We have spotted Imperial walkers!
Imperial walkers on the north ridge.
(into comlink) Echo station Five-Seven. We're on our way
where: INT. LUKE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE LEADER - COCKPIT

text: (into comlink) All right, boys, keep tight now.
where: INT. LUKE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE LEADER - COCKPIT

text: Luke, I have no approach vector. I'm not set.
where: INT. LUKE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE LEADER - COCKPIT

text: Steady, Dack. Attack pattern delta. Go now!
where: INT. LUKE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE LEADER - COCKPIT

text: All right, I'm coming in
where: INT. LUKE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE LEADER - COCKPIT

text: (into comlink) Hobbie, you still with me
where: INT. LUKE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE LEADER - COCKPIT

text: That armor's too strong for blasters
where: INT. LUKE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE LEADER - COCKPIT

text: (into comlink) Rogue Group, use your harpoons and tow cables. Go for the legs. It might be our only chance of stopping them. (to Dack) All right, stand by, Dack.
where: INT. LUKE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE LEADER - COCKPIT

text: Luke, we've got a malfunction in fire control. I'll have to cut in the auxiliary.
where: INT. LUKE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE LEADER - COCKPIT

text: Just hang on. Hang on, Dack. Get ready to fire that tow cable.
where: INT. LUKE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE LEADER - COCKPIT

text: Dack? Dack!
where: INT. LUKE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE LEADER - COCKPIT

text: Yes, Lord Vader. I've reached the main power generator. The shield will be down in moments. You may start your landing.
(into comlink) Rogue Three.
where: INT. LUKE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE LEADER - COCKPIT

text: (into comlink) Copy, Rogue Leader
where: INT. WEDGE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE THREE - COCKPIT

text: (over comlink) Wedge, I've lost my gunner. You'll have to make this shot. I'll cover for you. Set your harpoon. Follow me on the next pass.
where: INT. WEDGE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE THREE - COCKPIT

text: (into comlink) Coming around, Rogue Leader.
where: INT. WEDGE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE THREE - COCKPIT

text: (into comlink) Steady, Rogue Two
where: INT. LUKE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE LEADER - COCKPIT

text: (to gunner) Activate harpoon.
where: INT. WEDGE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE THREE - COCKPIT

text: (to gunner) Good shot, Janson.
where: INT. WEDGE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE THREE - COCKPIT

text: One more pass.
where: INT. WEDGE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE THREE - COCKPIT

text: Coming around. Once more
where: INT. WEDGE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE THREE - COCKPIT

text: Once more.
where: INT. WEDGE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE THREE - COCKPIT

text: Cable out! Let her go!
where: INT. WEDGE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE THREE - COCKPIT

text: Detach cable.
where: INT. WEDGE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE THREE - COCKPIT

text: Cable detached
where: INT. WEDGE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE THREE - COCKPIT

text: Come on!
where: EXT. HOTH - ICE PLAIN - SNOW TRENCH

text: (into comlink) Whooha! That got him!
where: INT. WEDGE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE THREE - COCKPIT

text: (into comlink) I see it, Wedge. Good work.
where: INT. LUKE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE LEADER - COCKPIT

text: I don't think we can protect two transports at a time.
It's risky, but we can't hold out much longer. We have no choice.
(into comlink) Launch patrols.
(to an aide) Evacuate remaining ground staff.
No, no! No! This one goes there, that one goes there. Right?
ARTOO, you take good care of Master Luke now, understand? And... do take good care of yourself. Oh, dear, oh, dear.
All troops will debark for ground assault. Prepare to target the main generator.
(into comlink) Rogue Two, are you all right?
where: INT. LUKE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE LEADER - COCKPIT

text: (into comlink) Yeah. I'm with you, Rogue Leader.
where: INT. ZEV'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE TWO - COCKPIT

text: (into comlink) We'll set harpoon. I'll cover for you.
where: INT. LUKE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE LEADER - COCKPIT

text: (into comlink) Coming around.
where: INT. ZEV'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE TWO - COCKPIT

text: (into comlink) Watch that cross fire, boys.
where: INT. LUKE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE LEADER - COCKPIT

text: (into comlink) Set for position three. (to gunner) Steady.
where: INT. ZEV'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE TWO - COCKPIT

text: (over comlink) Stay tight and low.
where: INT. ZEV'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE TWO - COCKPIT

text: (into comlink) Hobbie, I've been hit!
where: INT. LUKE'S SNOWSPEEDER, ROGUE LEADER - COCKPIT

text: You all right?
Why are you still here?
I heard the command center had been hit.
You got your clearance to leave.
Don't worry. I'll leave. First I'm going to get you to your ship.
Your Highness, we must take this last transport. It's our only hope.
(to controller) Send all troops in sector twelve to the south slope to protect the fighters.
(over loudspeaker) Imperial troops have entered the base.
Come on... that's it.
(to head controller) Give the evacuation code signal. And get to your transports!
K-one-zero... all troops disengage.
(to Han and Leia) Oh! Wait for me!
Begin retreat!
Fall back!
Distance to power generators?
One-seven, decimal two-eight.
Target. Maximum fire power.
(into comlink) Transport, this is Solo. Better take off - I can't get to you. I'll get the princess out on the Falcon.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - ICE CORRIDORS

text: But... but... but... where are you going? Uh... come back!!
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - ICE CORRIDORS

text: Wait! Wait for me! Wait! Stop!
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - ICE CORRIDOR

text: (exasperated) How typical.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - ICE CORRIDOR

text: Come on.
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - ICE CORRIDOR

text: Hurry up, goldenrod, or you're going to be a permanent resident!
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR

text: Wait! Wait!
where: INT. HOTH - REBEL BASE - MAIN HANGAR

text: (to Chewie) How's this?
where: INT. MAIN HANGAR - MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD

text: Would it helped if I got out and pushed?
where: INT. MAIN HANGAR - MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD

text: It might.
where: INT. MAIN HANGAR - MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD

text: Captain Solo, Captain Solo... sir, might I suggest that you...
where: INT. MAIN HANGAR - MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD

text: It can wait.
where: INT. MAIN HANGAR - MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD

text: This bucket of bolts is never going to get us past that blockade.
where: INT. MAIN HANGAR - MILLENNIUM FALCON - COCKPIT

text: This baby's got a few surprises left in her, sweetheart.
where: INT. MAIN HANGAR - MILLENNIUM FALCON - COCKPIT

text: Come on! Come on! Switch over. Let's hope we don't have a burnout.
where: INT. MAIN HANGAR - MILLENNIUM FALCON - COCKPIT

text: See?
where: INT. MAIN HANGAR - MILLENNIUM FALCON - COCKPIT

text: Someday you're going to be wrong, and I hope I'm there to see it.
where: INT. MAIN HANGAR - MILLENNIUM FALCON - COCKPIT

text: Punch it!
where: INT. MAIN HANGAR - MILLENNIUM FALCON - COCKPIT

text: ARTOO! Get her ready for takeoff.
where: INT. MAIN HANGAR - MILLENNIUM FALCON - COCKPIT

text: Good luck, Luke. See you at the rendezvous.
where: INT. MAIN HANGAR - MILLENNIUM FALCON - COCKPIT

text: Don't worry, ARTOO. We're going, we're going.
where: INT. MAIN HANGAR - MILLENNIUM FALCON - COCKPIT

text: (into comlink) There's nothing wrong, ARTOO. I'm just setting a new course.
where: INT. MAIN HANGAR - MILLENNIUM FALCON - COCKPIT

text: (into comlink) We're not going to regroup with the others.
where: INT. MAIN HANGAR - MILLENNIUM FALCON - COCKPIT

text: (into comlink) We're going to the Dagobah system.
where: INT. MAIN HANGAR - MILLENNIUM FALCON - COCKPIT

text: (into comlink) Yes, ARTOO?
where: INT. MAIN HANGAR - MILLENNIUM FALCON - COCKPIT

text: (into comlink, chuckling) That's all right. I'd like to keep it on manual control for a while.
where: INT. MAIN HANGAR - MILLENNIUM FALCON - COCKPIT

text: (harried) I saw them! I saw them!
Saw what?
Star Destroyers, two of them, coming right at us.
Sir, sir! Might I suggest...
(to Leia) Shut him up or shut him down! (to Chewie) Check the deflector shield!
Oh, great. Well, we can still outmaneuver them.
Take evasive action!
Prepare to make the jump to light- speed.
But, sir!
They're getting closer!
(with a gleam in his eye) Oh yeah? Watch this.
Watch what?
I think we're in trouble.
If I may say so, sir, I noticed earlier that the hyperdrive motivator has been damaged. It's impossible to go to light-speed!
We're in trouble!
Horizontal boosters...!
Alluvial dampers...! Well that's not it.
Bring me the hydrospanners!
I don't know how we're going to get out of this one.
Oww! Chewie!
That was no laser blast! Something hit us.
(over comlink) Han, get up here!
Come on, Chewie!
Asteroids!
Oh, no! Chewie, set two-seven- one.
What are you doing? You're not actually going into an asteroid field?
They'd be crazy to follow us, wouldn't they?
You don't have to do this to impress me.
Sir, the possibility of successfully navigating an asteroid field is approximately three thousand, seven hundred and twenty to one.
Never tell me the odds!
You said you wanted to be around when I made a mistake; well, this could be it, sweetheart.
I take it back. We're going to get pulverized if we stay out here much longer.
I'm not going to argue with that.
Pulverized?
I'm going in closer to one of those big ones.
Closer?
Closer?!
Oh, this is suicide!
There. That looks pretty good.
What looks pretty good?
Yeah. That'll do nicely.
(to Leia) Excuse me, ma'am, but where are we going?
I hope you know what you're doing.
Yeah, me too.
(into comlink) Yes, that's it. Dagobah.

(into comlink) No, I'm not going to change my mind about this. (getting a little nervous) I'm not picking up any cities or technology. Massive life-form readings, though. There's something alive down there...
(into comlink) Yes, I'm sure it's perfectly safe for droids.
(into comlink) I know, I know! All the scopes are dead. I can't see a thing! Just hang on, I'm going to start the landing cycle...
No, ARTOO, you stay put. I'll have a look around.
ARTOO?
ARTOO! Where are you?
ARTOO! You be more careful.
ARTOO - that way!
ARTOO!
Oh, no! Are you all right? Come on. You're lucky you don't taste very good. Anything broken?
If you're saying coming here was a bad idea, I'm beginning to agree with you. Oh, ARTOO, what are we doing here? It's like... something out of a dream, or, I don't know. Maybe I'm just going crazy.
Yes, Admiral?
where: EXT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: Our ships have sighted the Millennium Falcon, lord. But... it has entered an asteroid field and we cannot risk...
where: EXT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: (interrupting) Asteroids do not concern me, Admiral. I want that ship and not excuses.
where: EXT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: Yes, lord.
where: EXT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: I'm going to shut down everything but the emergency power systems.
Sir, I'm almost afraid to ask, but... does that include shutting me down, too?
No, I need you to talk to the Falcon, find out what's wrong with the hyperdrive.
Sir, it's quite possible this asteroid is not entirely stable.
Not entirely stable? I'm glad you're here to tell us these things. Chewie, take the professor in the back and plug him into the hyperdrive.
Oh! Sometimes I just don't understand human behavior. After all, I'm only trying to do my job in the most...
Let go.
Sshh!
Let go, please.
Don't get excited.
Captain, being held by you isn't quite enough to get me excited.
Sorry, sweetheart. We haven't got time for anything else.
Ready for some power? Okay. Let's see now. Put that in there. There you go.
(sighs) Now all I have to do is find this Yoda... if he even exists.
Still... there's something familiar about this place. I feel like... I don't know...
Feel like what?
(looking at the creature) Like we're being watched!
Away with your weapon! I mean you no harm.
I am wondering, why are you here?
I'm looking for someone.
Looking? Found someone, you have, I would say, hmmm?
(Trying to keep from smiling) Right.
Help you I can. Yes, mmmm.
I don't think so. I'm looking for a great warrior.
Ahhh! A great warrior. (laughs and shakes his head) Wars not make one great.
Put that down. Hey! That's my dinner!
How you get so big, eating food of this kind?
Listen, friend, we didn't mean to land in that puddle, and if we could get our ship out, we would, but we can't, so why don't you just...
(teasing) Aww, cannot get your ship out?
Hey, you could have broken this. Don't do that. Ohhh... you're making a mess. Hey, give me that!
(retreating with the lamp) Mine! Or I will help you not.
I don't want your help. I want my lamp back. I'll need it to get out of this slimy mudhole.
Mudhole? Slimy? My home this is.
Ah, ah, ah!
Oh, ARTOO, let him have it!
Mine! Mine!
ARTOO!
Mine!
Mine!
(fed up) Now will you move along, little fella? We're got a lot of work to do.
No! No, no! Stay and help you, I will. (laughs) Find your friend, hmm?
I'm not looking for a friend. I'm looking for a Jedi Master.
Oohhh. Jedi Master. Yoda. You seek Yoda.
You know him?
Mmm. Take you to him, I will. (laughs) Yes, yes. But now, we must eat. Come. Good food. Come.
(in the distance) Come, come.
Stay here and watch after the camp, ARTOO.
Oh, where is ARTOO when I need him?
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: Sir, I don't know where your ship learned to communicate, but it has the most peculiar dialect. I believe, sir, it says that the power coupling on the negative axis has been polarized. I'm afraid you'll have to replace it.
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: Well, of course I'll have to replace it.
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: Here! And Chewie...
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: (continuing) ... I think we'd better replace the negative power coupling.
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: Hey, Your Worship, I'm only trying to help.
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: (still struggling) Would you please stop calling me that?
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: Sure, Leia.
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: Oh, you make it so difficult sometimes.
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: I do, I really do. You could be a little nicer, though. (he watches her reaction) Come on, admit it. Sometimes you think I'm all right.
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: Occasionally... (a little smile, haltingly) ... when you aren't acting like a scoundrel.
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: (laughs) Scoundrel? Scoundrel? I like the sound of that.
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: Stop that.
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: Stop what?
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: Stop that! My hands are dirty.
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: My hands are dirty, too. What are you afraid of?
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: (looking right into his eyes) Afraid?
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: You're trembling.
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: I'm not trembling.
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: You like me because I'm a scoundrel. There aren't enough scoundrels in your life.
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: I happen to like nice men.
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: I'm a nice man.
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: No, you're not. You're...
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: Sir, sir! I've isolated the reverse power flux coupling.
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: Thank you. Thank you very much.
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: Oh, you're perfectly welcome, sir.
where: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - MAIN HOLD AREA

text: (in hologram) ... and that, Lord Vader, was the last time they appeared in any of our scopes. Considering the amount of damage we've sustained, they must have been destroyed.
No, Captain, they're alive. I want every ship available to sweep the asteroid field until they are found.
Lord Vader.
Yes, Admiral, what is it?
The Emperor commands you make contact with him.
Move the ship out of the asteroid field so that we can send a clear transmission.
Yes, my lord.
What is thy bidding, my master?
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: There is a great disturbance in the Force.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: I have felt it.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: We have a new enemy - Luke Skywalker.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: Yes, my master.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: He could destroy us.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: He's just a boy. Obi-Wan can no longer help him.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: The Force is strong with him. The son of Skywalker must not become a Jedi.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: If he could be turned, he would become a powerful ally.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: Yes. Yes. He would be a great asset. Can it be done?
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: He will join us or die, my master.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: Look, I'm sure it's delicious. I just don't understand why we can't see Yoda now.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: Patience! For the Jedi it is time to eat as well. Eat, eat. Hot. Good food, hm? Good, hmm?
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: How far away is Yoda? Will it take us long to get there?
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: Not far. Yoda not far. Patience. Soon you will be with him. (tasting food from the pot) Rootleaf, I cook. Why wish you become Jedi? Hm?
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: Mostly because of my father, I guess.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: Ah, your father. Powerful Jedi was he, powerful Jedi, mmm.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: (a little angry) Oh, come on. How could you know my father? You don't even know who I am. (fed up) Oh, I don't know what I'm doing here. We're wasting our time.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: (irritated) I cannot teach him. The boy has no patience.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: He will learn patience.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: Hmmm. Much anger in him, like his father.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: Was I any different when you taught me?
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: Hah. He is not ready.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: Yoda! I am ready. I... Ben! I can be a Jedi. Ben, tell him I'm ready.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: Ready, are you? What know you of ready? For eight hundred years have I trained Jedi. My own counsel will I keep on who is to be trained! A Jedi must have the deepest commitment, the most serious mind. (to the invisible Ben, indicating Luke) This one a long time have I watched. All his life has he looked away... to the future, to the horizon. Never his mind on where he was. Hmm? What he was doing. Hmph. Adventure. Heh! Excitement. Heh! A Jedi craves not these things. (turning to Luke) You are reckless!
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: So was I, if you'll remember.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: He is too old. Yes, too old to begin the training.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: But I've learned so much.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: (sighs) Will he finished what he begins?
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: I won't fail you - I'm not afraid.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: (turns slowly toward him) Oh, you will be. You will be.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - VADER'S CHAMBER

text: Sir, if I may venture an opinion...
where: INT. ASTEROID CAVE - MILLENNIUM FALCON - HOLD AREA

text: I'm not really interested in your opinion, Threepio.
where: INT. ASTEROID CAVE - MILLENNIUM FALCON - HOLD AREA

text: (out of breath) There's something out there.
where: INT. ASTEROID CAVE - MILLENNIUM FALCON - HOLD AREA

text: Where?
where: INT. ASTEROID CAVE - MILLENNIUM FALCON - HOLD AREA

text: Outside, in the cave.
where: INT. ASTEROID CAVE - MILLENNIUM FALCON - HOLD AREA

text: There it is. Listen! Listen!
where: INT. ASTEROID CAVE - MILLENNIUM FALCON - HOLD AREA

text: I'm going out there.
where: INT. ASTEROID CAVE - MILLENNIUM FALCON - HOLD AREA

text: Are you crazy?!
where: INT. ASTEROID CAVE - MILLENNIUM FALCON - HOLD AREA

text: I just got this bucket back together. I'm not going to let something tear it apart.
where: INT. ASTEROID CAVE - MILLENNIUM FALCON - HOLD AREA

text: Then I'm going with you.
where: INT. ASTEROID CAVE - MILLENNIUM FALCON - HOLD AREA

text: I think it might be better if I stay here and guard the ship. (hears another mysterious noise) Oh, no.
where: INT. ASTEROID CAVE - MILLENNIUM FALCON - HOLD AREA

text: This ground sure feels strange. It doesn't feel like rock at all.
There's an awful lot of moisture in here.
I don't know. I have a bad feeling about this.
Yeah.
(to Leia) Watch out!
Yeah, that's what I thought. Mynock. Chewie, check the rest of the ship, make sure there aren't any more attached. They're chewing on the power cables.
Mynocks?
Go on inside. We'll clean them off if there are any more.
Ohhh! Go away! Go away! Beastly little thing. Shoo! Shoo!
Wait a minute...
All right, Chewie, let's get out of here!
where: INT. ASTEROID CAVE - MILLENNIUM FALCON - ENTRY AREA

text: The Empire is still out there. I don't think it's wise to...
where: INT. ASTEROID CAVE - MILLENNIUM FALCON - ENTRY AREA

text: (interrupting) No time to discuss this in committee.
where: INT. ASTEROID CAVE - MILLENNIUM FALCON - ENTRY AREA

text: (angry) I am not a committee!
where: INT. ASTEROID CAVE - MILLENNIUM FALCON - ENTRY AREA

text: You can't make the jump to light- speed in this asteroid field...
where: INT. ASTEROID CAVE - MILLENNIUM FALCON - COCKPIT

text: Sit down, sweetheart. We're taking off!
where: INT. ASTEROID CAVE - MILLENNIUM FALCON - COCKPIT

text: Look!
where: INT. ASTEROID CAVE - MILLENNIUM FALCON - COCKPIT

text: I see it, I see it.
where: INT. ASTEROID CAVE - MILLENNIUM FALCON - COCKPIT

text: We're doomed!
where: INT. ASTEROID CAVE - MILLENNIUM FALCON - COCKPIT

text: The cave is collapsing.
where: INT. ASTEROID CAVE - MILLENNIUM FALCON - COCKPIT

text: This is no cave.
where: INT. ASTEROID CAVE - MILLENNIUM FALCON - COCKPIT

text: What?
where: INT. ASTEROID CAVE - MILLENNIUM FALCON - COCKPIT

text: Run! Yes. A Jedi's strength flows from the Force. But beware of the dark side. Anger... fear... aggression. The dark side of the Force are they. Easily they flow, quick to join you in a fight. If once you start down the dark path, forever will it dominate your destiny, consume you it will, as it did Obi-Wan's apprentice.
Vader. Is the dark side stronger?
No... no... no. Quicker, easier, more seductive.
But how am I to know the good side from the bad?
You will know. When you are calm, at peace. Passive. A Jedi uses the Force for knowledge and defense, never for attack.
But tell me why I can't...
(interrupting) No, no, there is no why. Nothing more will I teach you today. Clear your mind of questions. Mmm. Mmmmmmmm.
There's something not right here.
I feel cold, death.
That place... is strong with the dark side of the Force. A domain of evil it is. In you must go.
What's in there?
Only what you take with you.
Your weapons... you will not need them.
Bounty hunters. We don't need that scum.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - BRIDGE - CONTROL DECK

text: Yes, sir.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - BRIDGE - CONTROL DECK

text: Those Rebels won't escape us.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - BRIDGE - CONTROL DECK

text: Sir, we have a priority signal from the Star Destroyer Avenger.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - BRIDGE - CONTROL DECK

text: Right.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - BRIDGE - CONTROL DECK

text: ... there will be a substantial reward for the one who finds the Millennium Falcon. You are free to use any methods necessary, but I want them alive. No disintegrations.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - BRIDGE - CONTROL DECK

text: As you wish.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - BRIDGE - CONTROL DECK

text: Lord Vader! My lord, we have them.
where: INT. VADER'S STAR DESTROYER - BRIDGE - CONTROL DECK

text: Oh, thank goodness we're coming out of the asteroid field.
Let's get out of here. Ready for light-speed? One... two... three!
(frantic) It's not fair!
The transfer circuits are working. It's not my fault!
(almost expecting it) No light-speed?
It's not my fault.
Sir, we just lost the main rear deflector shield. One more direct hit on the back quarter and we're done for.
Turn her around.
I said turn her around! I'm going to put all power in the front shield.
You're going to attack them?!
Sir, the odds of surviving a direct assault on an Imperial Star Destroyer...
Shut up!
They're moving to attack position! Shields up!
Track them. They may come around for another pass.
Captain Needa, the ship no longer appears on our scopes.
They can't have disappeared. No ship that small has a cloaking device.
Well, there's no trace of them, sir.
Captain, Lord Vader demands an update on the pursuit.
(drawing a breath) Get a shuttle ready. I shall assume full responsibility for losing them, and apologize to Lord Vader. Meanwhile, continue to scan the area.
Yes, Captain Needa.
Use the Force. Yes...
Now... the stone. Feel it.
Concentrate!
Oh, no. We'll never get it out now.
So certain are you. Always with you it cannot be done. Hear you nothing that I say?
Master, moving stones around is one thing. This is totally different.
No! No different! Only different in your mind. You must unlearn what you have learned.
(focusing, quietly) All right, I'll give it a try.
No! Try not. Do. Or do not. There is no try.
(panting heavily) I can't. It's too big.
Size matters not. Look at me. Judge me by my size, do you? Hm? Mmmm.

And well you should not. For my ally in the Force. And a powerful ally it is. Life creates it, makes it grow. Its energy surrounds us and binds us. Luminous beings are we... (Yoda pinches Luke's shoulder) ... not this crude matter. (a sweeping gesture) You must feel the Force around you. (gesturing) Here, between you... me... the tree... the rock... everywhere! Yes, even between this land and that ship!
(discouraged) You want the impossible
I don't... I don't believe it.
That is why you fail.
Apology accepted, Captain Needa.
Lord Vader, our ships have completed their scan of the area and found nothing. If the Millennium Falcon went into light- speed, it'll be on the other side of the galaxy by now.
Alert all commands. Calculate every possible destination along their last know trajectory.
Yes, my lord. We'll find them.
Don't fail me again, Admiral.
Alert all commands. Deploy the fleet.
Captain Solo, this time you have gone too far. (Chewie growls) No, I will not be quiet, Chewbacca. Why doesn't anyone listen to me?
(to Chewie) The fleet is beginning to break up. Go back and stand by the manual release for the landing claw.
I really don't see how that is going to help. Surrender is a perfectly acceptable alternative in extreme circumstances. The Empire may be gracious enough...
Thank you.
What did you have in mind for your next move?
Well, if they follow standard Imperial procedure, they'll dump their garbage before they go to light-speed, then we just float away.
With the rest of the garbage. Then what?
Then we've got to find a safe port somewhere around here. Got any ideas?
No. Where are we?
The Anoat system.
Anoat system. There's not much there.
No. Well, wait. This is interesting. Lando.
Lando system?
Lando's not a system, he's a man. Lando Calrissian. He's a card player, gambler, scoundrel. You'd like him.
Thanks.
Bespin. It's pretty far, but I think we can make it.
(reading from the computer) A mining colony?
Yeah, a Tibanna gas mine. Lando conned somebody out of it. We go back a long way, Lando and me.
Can you trust him?
No. But he has no love for the Empire, I can tell you that.
(into intercom) Here we go, Chewie. Stand by. Detach!
You do have your moments. Not many, but you have them.
Concentrate... feel the Force flow. Yes. Good. Calm, yes. Through the Force, things you will see. Other places. The future... the past. Old friends long gone.
Han! Leia!
(shaking his head) Hmm. Control, control. You must learn control.
I saw... I saw a city in the clouds.
Mmm. Friends you have there.
They were in pain.
It is the future you see.
Future? Will they die?
Difficult to see. Always in motion is the future.
I've got to go to them.
Decide you must how to serve them best. If you leave now, help them you could. But you would destroy all for which they have fought and suffered.
(into transmitter) No, I don't have a landing permit. I'm trying to reach Lando Calrissian.
(into transmitter) Whoa! Wait a minute! Let me explain.
You will not deviate from your present course.
Rather touchy, aren't they?
I thought you knew this person.
(to Chewie) Well, that was a long time ago. I'm sure he's forgotten about that.
Permission granted to land on Platform Three-two-seven.
(into transmitter) Thank you.
There's nothing to worry about. We go way back, Lando and me.
Who's worried?
Oh. No one to meet us.
where: EXT. LANDING PLATFORM - DOOR OF MILLENNIUM FALCON

text: I don't like this.
where: EXT. LANDING PLATFORM - DOOR OF MILLENNIUM FALCON

text: Well, what would you like?
where: EXT. LANDING PLATFORM - DOOR OF MILLENNIUM FALCON

text: Well, they did let us land.
where: EXT. LANDING PLATFORM - DOOR OF MILLENNIUM FALCON

text: Look, don't worry. Everything's going to be fine. Trust me.
where: EXT. LANDING PLATFORM - DOOR OF MILLENNIUM FALCON

text: See? My friend. (to Chewie) Keep your eyes open, okay?
where: EXT. LANDING PLATFORM - DOOR OF MILLENNIUM FALCON

text: Why, you slimy, double-crossing, no-good swindler! You've got a lot of guts coming here, after what you pulled.
(laughs) How you doing, you old pirate? So good to see you! I never thought I'd catch up with you again. Where you been?
Well, he seems very friendly.
where: EXT. LANDING PLATFORM - DOOR OF MILLENNIUM FALCON

text: (wary) Yes... very friendly.
where: EXT. LANDING PLATFORM - DOOR OF MILLENNIUM FALCON

text: What are you doing here?
(gestures toward the Falcon) Ahh... repairs. I thought you could help me out.
(in mock panic) What have you done to my ship?
Your ship? Hey, remember, you lost her to me fair and square.
Hello. What have we here? Welcome. I'm Lando Calrissian. I'm the administrator of this facility. And who might you be?
Leia.
Welcome, Leia.
All right, all right, you old smoothie.
Hello, sir. I am See-Threepio, human-cyborg relations. My facilities are at your...
Well, really!
What's wrong with the Falcon?
Hyperdrive.
I'll get my people to work on it.
Good.
You know, that ship saved my life quite a few times. She's the fastest hunk of junk in the galaxy.
How's the gas mine? Is it paying off for you?

Oh, not as well as I'd like. We're a small outpost and not very self-sufficient. And I've had supply problems of every kind. I've had labor difficulties... (catches Han grinning at him) What's so funny?
You. Listen to you - you sound like a businessman, a responsible leader. Who'd have thought that, huh?
You know, seeing you sure brings back a few things.
Yeah.
(shakes his head) Yeah. I'm responsible these days. It's the price you pay for being successful.
Oh! Nice to see a familiar face.
(mumbles) E chu ta!
How rude!
That sounds like an R2 unit in there. I wonder if...
Hello? How interesting. Oh, my.
(from within) Who are you?
Oh, I'm terribly sorry. I... I didn't mean to intrude. No, no, please don't get up. No!
Luke! You must complete the training.
I can't keep the vision out of my head. They're my friends. I've got to help them.
You must not go!
But Han and Leia will die if I don't.
You don't know that.
Even Yoda cannot see their fate.
But I can help them! I feel the Force!
But you cannot control it. This is a dangerous time for you, when you will be tempted by the dark side of the Force.
Yes, yes. To Obi-Wan you listen. The cave. Remember your failure at the cave!
But I've learned so much since then. Master Yoda, I promise to return and finish what I've begun. You have my word.
It is you and your abilities the Emperor wants. that is why your friends are made to suffer.
And that is why I have to go.
Luke, I don't want to lose you to the Emperor the way I lost Vader.
You won't.

Stopped they must be. On this all depends. Only a fully trained Jedi Knight with the Force as his ally will conquer Vader and his Emperor. If you end your training now, if you choose the quick and easy path, as Vader did, you will become an agent of evil.
Patience.
And sacrifice Han and Leia?
If you honor what they fight for...yes!
If you choose to face Vader, you will do it alone. I cannot interfere.
I understand. (he moves to his X-wing) ARTOO, fire up the converters.
Luke, don't give in to hate - that leads to the dark side.
Strong is Vader. Mind what you have learned. Save you it can.
I will. And I'll return. I promise.
(sighs) Told you, I did. Reckless is he. Now matters are worse.
That boy is our last hope.
(looks up) No. There is another.
The ship is almost finished. Two or Three more things and we're in great shape.
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - LIVING QUARTERS - DAY

text: The sooner the better. Something's wrong here. No one has seen or knows anything about Threepio. He's been gone too long to have gotten lost.
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - LIVING QUARTERS - DAY

text: Relax. I'll talk to Lando and see what I can find out.
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - LIVING QUARTERS - DAY

text: I don't trust Lando.
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - LIVING QUARTERS - DAY

text: Well, I don't trust him, either. But he is my friend. Besides, we'll soon be gone.
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - LIVING QUARTERS - DAY

text: And then you're as good as gone, aren't you?
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - LIVING QUARTERS - DAY

text: What happened?
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - LIVING QUARTERS - DAY

text: Where? Found him in a junk pile?
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - LIVING QUARTERS - DAY

text: Oh, what a mess. Chewie, do you think you can repair him?
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - LIVING QUARTERS - DAY

text: Lando's got people who can fix him.
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - LIVING QUARTERS - DAY

text: No, thanks.
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - LIVING QUARTERS - DAY

text: I'm sorry. Am I interrupting anything?
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - LIVING QUARTERS - DAY

text: Not really.
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - LIVING QUARTERS - DAY

text: You look absolutely beautiful. You truly belong here with us among the clouds.
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - LIVING QUARTERS - DAY

text: (coolly) Thank you.
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - LIVING QUARTERS - DAY

text: Will you join me for a little refreshment?
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - LIVING QUARTERS - DAY

text: Everyone's invited, of course.
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - LIVING QUARTERS - DAY

text: Having trouble with you droid?
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - LIVING QUARTERS - DAY

text: No. No problem. Why?
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - LIVING QUARTERS - DAY

text: So you see, since we're a small operation, we don't fall into the... uh... jurisdiction of the Empire.
So you're part of the mining guild then?
No, not actually. Our operation is small enough not to be noticed... which is advantageous for everybody since our customers are anxious to avoid attracting attention to themselves.
Aren't you afraid the Empire's going to find out about this little operation and shut you down?

That's always been a danger looming like a shadow over everything we've built here. But things have developed that will insure security. I've just made a deal that will keep the Empire out of here forever.
We would be honored if you would join us.
I had no choice. They arrived right before you did. I'm sorry.
I'm sorry, too.
(into comlink) No, Threepio's with them.
(into comlink) Just hang on. We're almost there.
Mmmm. Oh, my. Uh, I, uh - Take this off! I, uh, don't mean to intrude here. I, don't, no, no, no... Please don't get up. No!
Stormtroopers? Here? We're in danger. I must tell the others. Oh, no! I've been shot!
Lord Vader.
(to Fett) You may take Captain Solo to Jabba the Hut after I have Skywalker.
He's no good to me dead.
He will not be permanently damaged.
Lord Vader, what about Leia and the Wookiee?
They must never again leave this city.
That was never a condition of our agreement, nor was giving Han to this bounty hunter!
Perhaps you think you're being treated unfairly.
No.
Good. It would be unfortunate if I had to leave a garrison here.
This deal's getting worse all the time.

Oh, yes, that's very good. I like that. Oh! Something's not right because now I can't see. Wait. Wait! Oh, my! what have you done? I'm backwards, you stupid furball. Only an overgrown mophead like you would be stupid enough...
I feel terrible.
Why are they doing this?
They never even asked me any questions.
Lando.
Get out of here, Lando!
Shut up and listen! Vader has agreed to turn Leia and Chewie over to me.
Over to you?
They'll have to stay here, but at least they'll be safe.
What about Han?
Vader's giving him to the bounty hunter.
Vader wants us all dead.
He doesn't want you at all. He's after somebody called Skywalker.
Luke?
Lord Vader has set a trap for him.
And we're the bait.
Well, he's on his way.
Perfect. You fixed us all pretty good, didn't you? (spits it out) My friend!
Stop! I've done all I can. I'm sorry I couldn't do better, but I have my own problems.
Yeah, you're a real hero.
(dabs at his wound) You certainly have a way with people.
This facility is crude, but it should be adequate to freeze Skywalker for his journey to the Emperor.
Lord Vader, ship approaching. X-wing class.
Good. Monitor Skywalker and allow him to land.
Lord Vader, we only use this facility for carbon freezing. If you put him in there, it might kill him.
I do not want the Emperor's prize damaged. We will test it... on Captain Solo.
If only you had attached my legs, I wouldn't be in this ridiculous position. Now, remember, Chewbacca, you have a responsibility to me, so don't do anything foolish.
(to Lando) What's going on... buddy?
You're being put into carbon freeze.
What if he doesn't survive? He's worth a lot to me.
The Empire will compensate you if he dies. Put him in!
Oh, no! No, no, no! Stop, Chewbacca, stop...!
Stop, Chewie, stop! Do you hear me? Stop!
Yes, stop, please! I'm not ready to die.
Chewie! Chewie, this won't help me. Hey!
Save your strength. There'll be another time. The princess - you have to take care of her. You hear me?
I love you!
I know.
What... what's going on? Turn round, Chewbacca, I can't see. Oh... they've encased him in carbonite. He should be quite well-protected - if he survives the freezing process, that is.
Well, Calrissian, did he survive?
Yes, he's alive. And in perfect hibernation.
He's all yours bounty hunter. Reset the chamber for Skywalker.
Skywalker has just landed, my lord.
Good. See to it that he finds his way here. Calrissian, take the princess and the Wookiee to my ship.
You said they'd be left in the city under my supervision.
I am altering the deal. Pray I don't alter it any further.
Luke! Luke, don't - it's a trap! It's a trap!
The Force is with you, young Skywalker. But you are not a Jedi yet.
Well done. Hold them in the security tower - and keep it quiet. Move.
What do you think you're doing?
We're getting out of here.
I knew all along it had to be a mistake.
Do you think that after what you did to Han we're going to trust you?
(choking) I had no choice...
(to Chewie) What are you doing? Trust him, trust him!
Oh, so we understand, don't we, Chewie? He had no choice.
I'm just trying to help...
We don't need any of your help.
(choking) H-a-a-a...
What?
It sounds like Han.
There's still a chance to save Han... I mean, at the East Platform...
Chewie.
(to Lando) I'm terribly sorry about all this. After all, he's only a Wookiee.
Put Captain Solo in the cargo hold.
where: EXT. CLOUD CITY - EAST LANDING PLATFORM - BOBA FETT'S SHIP

text: ARTOO! ARTOO! Where have you been?
where: EXT. CLOUD CITY - EAST LANDING PLATFORM - BOBA FETT'S SHIP

text: Turn around, you wooly...! (to ARTOO) Hurry, hurry! We're trying to save Han from the bounty hunter!
where: EXT. CLOUD CITY - EAST LANDING PLATFORM - BOBA FETT'S SHIP

text: Well, at least your still in one piece! Look what happened to me!
where: EXT. CLOUD CITY - EAST LANDING PLATFORM - BOBA FETT'S SHIP

text: Oh, no! Chewie, they're behind you!
where: EXT. EAST LANDING PLATFORM - SIDE BAY

text: You have learned much, young one.
You'll find I'm full of surprises.
Your destiny lies with me, Skywalker. Obi-Wan knew this to be true.
No!
All to easy. Perhaps you are not as strong as the Emperor thought.
Impressive... most impressive.
Obi-Wan has taught you well. You have controlled your fear... now release your anger.
Only your hatred can destroy me.
The security codes has been changed!
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - CORRIDOR LEADING TO LANDING PLATFORM

text: ARTOO, you can tell the computer to override the security system.
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - CORRIDOR LEADING TO LANDING PLATFORM

text: Attention! This is LANDO Calrissian. The Empire has takes control of the city. I advise everyone to leave before more Imperial troops arrive.
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - CORRIDOR LEADING TO LANDING PLATFORM

text: This way.
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - CORRIDOR LEADING TO LANDING PLATFORM

text: Don't blame me. I'm an interpreter. I'm not supposed to know a power socket from a computer terminal.
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - CORRIDOR LEADING TO LANDING PLATFORM

text: What are you talking about? We're not interested in the hyperdrive on the Millennium Falcon. It's fixed! Just open the door, you stupid lump.
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - CORRIDOR LEADING TO LANDING PLATFORM

text: (to ARTOO) I never doubted you for a second. Wonderful!
where: INT. CLOUD CITY - CORRIDOR LEADING TO LANDING PLATFORM

text: Ouch! Oh! Ah! That hurt. Bend down, you thoughtless... Ow!
where: EXT. LANDING PLATFORM - CLOUD CITY - DUSK

text: Leia! Go!
where: EXT. LANDING PLATFORM - CLOUD CITY - DUSK

text: I thought that hairy beast would be the end of me. Of course, I've looked better.
where: EXT. LANDING PLATFORM - CLOUD CITY - DUSK

text: You are beaten. It is useless to resist. Don't let yourself be destroyed as Obi-Wan did.
where: INT. GANTRY - OUTSIDE CONTROL ROOM - REACTOR SHAFT

text: There is no escape. Don't make me destroy you. You do not yet realize your importance. You have only begun to discover your power. Join me and I will complete your training. With our combined strength, we can end this destructive conflict and bring order to the galaxy.
where: INT. GANTRY - OUTSIDE CONTROL ROOM - REACTOR SHAFT

text: I'll never join you!
where: INT. GANTRY - OUTSIDE CONTROL ROOM - REACTOR SHAFT

text: If you only knew the power of the dark side. Obi-Wan never told you what happened to your father.
where: INT. GANTRY - OUTSIDE CONTROL ROOM - REACTOR SHAFT

text: He told me enough! It was you who killed him.
where: INT. GANTRY - OUTSIDE CONTROL ROOM - REACTOR SHAFT

text: No. I am your father.
where: INT. GANTRY - OUTSIDE CONTROL ROOM - REACTOR SHAFT

text: No. No. That's not true! That's impossible!
where: INT. GANTRY - OUTSIDE CONTROL ROOM - REACTOR SHAFT

text: Search your feelings. You know it to be true.
where: INT. GANTRY - OUTSIDE CONTROL ROOM - REACTOR SHAFT

text: No! No! No!
where: INT. GANTRY - OUTSIDE CONTROL ROOM - REACTOR SHAFT

text: Luke. You can destroy the Emperor. He has foreseen this. It is your destiny. Join me, and together we can rule the galaxy as father and son. Come with me. It is the only way.
where: INT. GANTRY - OUTSIDE CONTROL ROOM - REACTOR SHAFT

text: Ben... Ben, please!
where: EXT. BOTTOM OF CLOUD CITY - WEATHER VANE - DUSK

text: Ben. Leia!
where: EXT. BOTTOM OF CLOUD CITY - WEATHER VANE - DUSK

text: Hear me! Leia!
where: EXT. BOTTOM OF CLOUD CITY - WEATHER VANE - DUSK

text: Luke... We've got to go back.
What?
I know where Luke is.
But what about those fighter?
Chewie, just do it.
But what about Vader?
All right, all right, all right.
Bring my shuttle.
(pointing out the cockpit window) Look, someone's up there.
It's Luke. Chewie, slow down. Slow down and we'll get under him. Lando, open the top hatch.
Okay. Easy, Chewie.
(into intercom) Lando?
(over intercom) Okay, let's go.
Oh, Leia.
All right, Chewie. Let's go.
I'll be back.
Star Destroyer.
All right, Chewie. Ready for light-speed.
If your people fixed the hyperdrive.
All the coordinates are set. It's now or never.
Punch it!
They told me they fixed it. I trusted them to fix it. It's not my fault!
They'll be in range of our tractor beam in moments, my lord.
Did your men deactivate the hyperdrive on the Millennium Falcon?
Yes, my lord.
Good. Prepare the boarding party and set your weapons for stun.
Yes, my lord.
Noisy brute. Why don't we just go into light-speed?
We can't? How would you know the hyperdrive is deactivated?
The city's central computer told you? ARTOO-Detoo, you know better than to trust a strange computer. Ouch! Pay attention to what you're doing!
Luke.
Father.
Son, come with me.
(moaning) Ben, why didn't you tell me?
(into intercom) Chewie!
It's Vader.
Luke... it is your destiny.
Ben, why didn't you tell me?
Alert all commands. Ready for the tractor beam.
ARTOO, come back at once! You haven't finished with me yet! You don't know how to fix the hyperdrive. Chewbacca can do it. I'm standing here in pieces, and you're having delusions of grandeur!
Oh, you did it!
(into comlink) Luke, we're ready for takeoff.
(over comlink) Good luck, Lando
(into comlink) When we find Jabba the Hut and that bounty hunter, we'll contact you.
(into comlink) I'll meet you at the rendezvous point on Tatooine.
(into comlink) Princess, we'll find Han. I promise.
(into comlink) Chewie, I'll be waiting for your signal.
(into comlink) Take care, you two. May the Force be with you.
Ow!
